2010-11-15

Movember 2010: Favourite moustaches #8 - 3/4 of Black Sabbath

Mostly this is for Tony Iommi because along with Lemmy his was the rock and roll moustache that came into my head as soon as I decided to do this... but Bill and Geezer looking good too. Not wanting to celebrate the clean shaven this month but doesn't Ozzy look gorgeous in this photo?


During November I'm growing a 'tache to raise money for prostate cancer - come sponsor me over here.
